data.message: it's impossible to contact you, i tried in so many ways but haven't got reply back, unbelievable "world biggest company" - frustration

replies.message: Hey Ohad. This is a great place to ask questions. What can we help you with? -Kiara
just open an account for my mom but it's got disabled, send query via facebook help and sent PM with all of her details including pictures of her ID & driving licence but nothing helps, any advise?

I've been trying for months now to get the answer to this question: I am the original and sole owner of facebook.com/sweetpeascharm, however, for some reason no one is listed as the Admin and I am only listed as an Editor. How do I list myself as the Admin?? I need to make some changes to my business information, but I can't!
Lynn McGavran Bennett well, good luck with that, i just gave up seeking answers from them, Mark Zuckerberg - FYI
